pages.text: $(bred)Sunday Edition Zombie$() really loves comics, so never never touch it.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)350$()$(br)$(bred)Paper Health$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Little High$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : When its newspaper broken, it will be immediately angered, and then increase its speed to $(l)Super Fast$() and damage to $(l)Very High$().
